name: Validate user is allowed to perform "Mark as Non-Renewable" transaction

testSteps.description: 1: Validate user is allowed to perform "Mark as Non-Renewable" transaction ({NonRenewReason=Agent of Record})

children.description: When underwriter is on home page
And Underwriter selects mark as non renewal transaction on policy
And with non renew reason 'Agent of Record' and click on save and continue
When underwriter selects book on mark as non renewal transaction
Then policy status should be 'In Force (Non-Renewed)'

testSteps.description: 2: Validate user is allowed to perform "Mark as Non-Renewable" transaction ({NonRenewReason=Audit Non-Compliance})

children.description: When underwriter is on home page
And Underwriter selects mark as non renewal transaction on policy
And with non renew reason 'Audit Non-Compliance' and click on save and continue
When underwriter selects book on mark as non renewal transaction
Then policy status should be 'In Force (Non-Renewed)'
